::Prowl::

"Damn! I'll take crae of it."
He puts Starice in a CR.
"You get well."
He starts to head out of the base. He opens a comm.
"Keep your eyes open for Symphony, he shot Starice and his going for
Azure Blade. I want him stoped!"
